import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import InputForm from '../InputForm/InputForm' import style from"./Signup.module.css" export default function Signup() { const [values,setValues] = useState({ name:"", email:"", pass:"" }) const [errormsg,seterrorMsg] = useState() return (

Signup

{setValues((prev)=>({...prev,name:event.target.value}))}} /> {setValues((prev)=>({...prev,email:event.target.value}))}}/> {setValues((prev)=>({...prev,pass:event.target.value}))}}/>
{errormsg}

Already have an account?

) }
